name: gg.idem.beamable.microservice
description:
Package Idem Microservice extends Beamable with capacity to use idem.gg matchmaking service. To do it
▪fill in the required configuration parameters
▪deploy Idem Microservice
▪use BeamContext.Default.IdemService()

Required configuration in 'Idem' namespace:
▪Username - Idem username
▪Password - Idem password
▪SupportedGameModes - comma separated list of supported game modes
▪PlayerTimeoutMs - inactivity delay in ms before a player will be removed from MM
▪GlobalMatchTimeoutS - delay after a match will be considered abandoned and removed from MM
▪Debug - not empty value will enable verbose logging and allow to use debug endpoints
